title: Ticket #4538: Validate condor_status can read ads from a file
description:
We want to feed condor_status info from a file. Does it work. This is a V080300 developer series test and feature.

Currently there are two tests with each saved configuration.

The first test is having a sorted condor_statua -l output. We eat that file with condor_status -ads file -l. We sort those ads to. That output should match exactly what we fed it.

The second thing we do is check similarity between the condor_status done before we did the -ads file and the output after. We are not checking fields with times as these may vary on slower systems.

One pair of checks for each config found.
